statements: SELECT id, location, gallons_used FROM WaterUsageData WHERE is_compliant = true;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT location, usage_date, gallons_used FROM WaterUsageData WHERE gallons_used > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, usage_date, usage_time FROM WaterUsageData WHERE usage_date > '2022-01-01' AND is_compliant = true;
SELECT id, gallons_used, is_compliant FROM WaterUsageData WHERE location LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY usage_date DESC, usage_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, location, gallons_used FROM WaterUsageData WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY location, usage_time
SELECT SUM(gallons_used) AS total_usage FROM WaterUsageData WHERE is_compliant = TRUE GROUP BY location HAVING total_usage > 100
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE usage_date = '2022-06-15' AND location LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY gallons_used DESC
SELECT AVG(gallons_used) AS avg_usage, location, is_compliant FROM WaterUsageData WHERE location IN ('California', 'Texas') GROUP BY location, is_compliant HAVING avg_usage > 50
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData;
SELECT customer_id, usage_date FROM WaterUsageData ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM CustomerInfo WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE gallons_used > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM CustomerInfo ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM CustomerInfo WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31' ORDER BY gallons_used DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerInfo ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM CustomerInfo WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData;
SELECT user_id, water_consumed FROM WaterUsageData WHERE water_consumed > 100;
SELECT user_id, date_recorded FROM WaterUsageData ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInformation WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, is_compliant FROM ComplianceStatus WHERE date_checked > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(water_consumed) AS total_water_consumed FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, u.email, w.water_consumed FROM UserInformation u JOIN WaterUsageData w ON u.user_id = w.user_id;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceStatus WHERE is_compliant = TRUE ORDER BY date_checked DESC;
SELECT u.username, cs.is_compliant FROM UserInformation u JOIN ComplianceStatus cs ON u.user_id = cs.user_id WHERE cs.date_checked > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM water_sources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM water_sources;
SELECT * FROM water_meters WHERE usage_gallons > 1000;
SELECT meter_id, reading_date, usage_gallons FROM water_meters ORDER BY reading_date DESC;

SELECT source_name, regulation_name FROM water_sources JOIN water_compliance ON water_sources.source_id = water_compliance.compliance_id JOIN water_regulations ON water_compliance.regulation_id = water_regulations.regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM water_sources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM water_sources WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM water_meters WHERE reading_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY usage_gallons DESC;

SELECT wm.meter_id, ws.source_name, wc.compliance_date FROM water_meters wm JOIN water_sources ws ON wm.source_id = ws.source_id JOIN water_compliance wc ON wm.meter_id = wc.meter_id WHERE wc.regulation_id = 1;

SELECT ws.source_name, COUNT(wm.meter_id) AS meter_count FROM water_sources ws LEFT JOIN water_meters wm ON ws.source_id = wm.source_id GROUP BY ws.source_name HAVING COUNT(wm.meter_id) > 0 ORDER BY meter_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumptionData;
SELECT location, date, usage_gallons FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE location='City Hall';
SELECT usage_gallons, date FROM WaterConsumptionData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports WHERE compliance_status='Compliant';
SELECT provider_name FROM WaterProviders WHERE provider_id=1;
SELECT id, date, location, usage_gallons FROM WaterConsumptionData WHERE location = 'City A' ORDER BY date DESC, usage_gallons ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterMeterReading WHERE reading BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND value_gallons > 1000 ORDER BY reading ASC;
SELECT location, SUM(usage_gallons) AS total_usage FROM WaterConsumptionData GROUP BY location HAVING total_usage > 5000;
SELECT WR.meter_id, WR.reading, WR.value_gallons, CP.compliance_status FROM WaterMeterReading WR JOIN ComplianceReports CP ON WR.meter_id = CP.report_id;

SELECT WD.id, WD.location, WT.threshold_gallons, WP.provider_name FROM WaterConsumptionData WD LEFT JOIN WaterUsageThresholds WT ON WD.location = WT.location JOIN WaterProviders WP ON WT.threshold_id = WP.provider_id ORDER BY WD.id DESC;
